subject: p10410641
History: Shortness of breath, need for evaluation for fluid status.
Findings: As compared to previous radiograph, the right pleural effusion has slightly decreased. On the left, however, a relatively extensive pleural effusion, occupying approximately one-third of the left hemithorax, has newly appeared. Subsequent areas of atelectasis. No pneumothorax or pneumonia. No evidence of pulmonary edema.
